price: এতেকে যিয়ে অণু পৰিমাণ সৎকৰ্ম কৰিছে সেয়া সি দেখিবলৈ পাব।
arabic: فَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيۡرٗا يَرَهُۥ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: faman yaʿmal mith'qāla dharratin khayran yarahu
